analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x620266bf3b1675646173f9b8d7b5ed92c0805400.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/14/0x620266bf3b1675646173f9b8d7b5ed92c0805400.sol#426)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.buy (/unique_chucks/14/0x620266bf3b1675646173f9b8d7b5ed92c0805400.sol#869-894):
	External calls:
	- amount = getPurchaseReturn(_connectorToken,_depositAmount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x620266bf3b1675646173f9b8d7b5ed92c0805400.sol#877-879)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- connectors (/unique_chucks/14/0x620266bf3b1675646173f9b8d7b5ed92c0805400.sol#885-886)

	State variables written after the call(s):
